### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://www.youtube.com/@tunetankmusic/about](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F%40tunetankmusic%2Fabout) ### Comment > I used AdGuard on Chromium, Brave, and Firefox. While AdGuard is active I can not unsubscribe from any video on YouTube on any browser. Disabling and trying the page again fails. ```adblock
```adblock
youtubekids.com,youtube-nocookie.com,youtube.com#@%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'ytInitialPlayerResponse.adPlacements', 'undefined')

```

Also not reproduced it on my end. Try to check the site without third-party filters, except ublock ones. As I recall, it's recommended to enable them.
Unfortunately, uBO does not support such rules and you see the cookie window.
However, AdGuard products do that, so you won't see the cookies.
